Bash(__NEW_LINE_65ad7bf138d8f350__ python3 - <<'PYEOF'
with open\('index.html', 'r', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
    lines = f.readlines\(\)

# Lines are 1-indexed; Python list is 0-indexed
# Replace lines 52-5694 \(<style>...</style>\) with a single <link> tag
# Replace lines 7458-23792 \(<script>...</script>\) with <script type="module">

# We'll build the new file:
# - lines 1-51 \(indices 0-50\): keep
# - line 52 \(<style>\): replace with <link ...>
# - lines 53-5694: drop
# - lines 5695-7457: keep
# - line 7458 \(<script>\): replace with <script type="module" ...>
# - lines 7459-23792: drop
# - lines 23793-23794: keep

new_lines = []
new_lines += lines[0:51]  # lines 1-51
new_lines.append\('    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/main.css">\\n'\)  # replaces line 52-5694
new_lines += lines[5694:7457]  # lines 5695-7457
new_lines.append\('    <script type="module" src="js/main.js"></script>\\n'\)  # replaces line 7458-23792
new_lines += lines[23792:]  # lines 23793-23794

with open\('index.html', 'w', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
    f.writelines\(new_lines\)

print\(f"Done: {len\(new_lines\)} lines"\)
PYEOF)

Bash(__NEW_LINE_3367daed560c576b__ /c/Users/00arn/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python313/python - <<'PYEOF'
with open\('index.html', 'r', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
    lines = f.readlines\(\)

# Build new file:
# lines 1-51 \(indices 0-50\): keep
# line 52 \(<style>\) through line 5694 \(</style>\): replace with single <link> line
# lines 5695-7457 \(indices 5694-7456\): keep
# line 7458 \(<script>\) through line 23792 \(</script>\): replace with single <script type="module"> line
# lines 23793-23794 \(indices 23792-23793\): keep

new_lines = []
new_lines += lines[0:51]                                                  # lines 1-51
new_lines.append\('    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/main.css">\\n'\)     # replaces lines 52-5694
new_lines += lines[5694:7457]                                             # lines 5695-7457
new_lines.append\('    <script type="module" src="js/main.js"></script>\\n'\)# replaces lines 7458-23792
new_lines += lines[23792:]                                                # lines 23793-23794

with open\('index.html', 'w', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
    f.writelines\(new_lines\)

print\(f"Done: {len\(new_lines\)} lines total"\)
PYEOF)
